New Records: Sunil Chhetri retired as the fourth highest goal-scorer in international football
Key Match Events: The match ended in a goalless draw.
There was a near miss by India in the second half.
A mini-brawl between players led to a yellow card.
Pre-Game Insights: The match was significant for head coach Igor Stimac.
India needed a win to qualify for the next round.
Post-Match Reflections: The result kept India's qualification hopes alive.
Sunil Chhetri's farewell was an emotional moment.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Defensive lapses were a concern for both teams.
The match had end-to-end attacks but no goals.
Others: Starting line-ups for both India and Kuwait were mentioned.
